# cineplus
Aplicacion basica de cobro para un cine en python con wxglade .consta de 4 ventanas inicio sesion ,Taquilla,Dulceria,Tiket que es lo final

class Ventana4(wx.Frame):
    def __init__(self,parent,informacion="",subtotal1=0,informacion2="",subtotal2=0):
        # begin wxGlade: Ventana4.__init__
        #kwds["style"] = kwds.get("style", 0) | wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE
        #wx.Frame.__init__(self, *args, **kwds)
        super().__init__(parent, style= wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE)
        self.SetSize((632, 715))
        self.SetTitle("frame_3")

        self.panel_1 = wx.Panel(self, wx.ID_ANY)

        sizer_1 = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)

        grid_sizer_1 = wx.GridSizer(9, 1, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_1, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        grid_sizer_2 = wx.GridSizer(1, 3, 0, 0)
        grid_sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_2, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)
        
        self.infoTaquilla=informacion
        self.infoDulceria=informacion2

        self.subtotalDulceria=subtotal2
        self.total=self.subtotalTaquilla+self.subtotalDulceria

        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.btncancelar, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        self.btnFinalizar = wx.Button(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Finalizar\n")
        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.btnFinalizar, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        self.panel_1.SetSizer(sizer_1)

        self.Layout()

        self.btncancelar.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.cancelarVenta)
        self.btnFinalizar.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.finalizarVenta)
        # end wxGlade

    def cancelarVenta(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana4.<event_handler>
        wx.MessageBox("La compra fue cancelada.","Cancelar venta",wx.OK | wx.ICON_INFORMATION)
        wx.Exit()

    def finalizarVenta(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana4.<event_handler>
        wx.MessageBox(f"Compra finalizada. El total a pagar es: ${self.total}", "Finalizar Venta", wx.OK|wx.ICON_INFORMATION)
        v2=Ventana2(self)
        v2.Show()
        self.Hide()
        event.Skip()
# end of class Ventana4

    def calcularComboBasico(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
      numero=int(self.spComboB.GetValue())
      subtotalcombo=numero*75
      self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
      self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
      self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}Combos Basicos\n"
      self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
      event.Skip()
    def calcularComboCuates(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.spComboC.GetValue())
        subtotalcombo=numero*130
        self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}Combos Cuates\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
    def calcularComboFamiliar(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.spComboF.GetValue())
        subtotalcombo=numero*350
        self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}Combos Familar\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
    def calcularPalomitasCh(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.spPalomitasCh.GetValue())
        subtotalcombo=numero*65
        self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}Palomitas Ch\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
    def calcularPalomitasMd(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.soPalomitasMd.GetValue())
        subtotalcombo=numero*80
        self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}palomitas Md\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
    def calcularPalomitasG(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.spPalomitasG.GetValue())
        subtotalcombo=numero*350
        self.subtotalDulceria=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalcombo
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.subtotalDulceria}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero}Palomitas G\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
    def agregarRefresco(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        numero=int(self.spCantidad.GetValue())
        tamano=self.cmbTamano.GetValue()
        sabor=self.cmbSabor.GetValue()
        if tamano=="CHICO":
            subtotalrefresco=numero*25
        elif tamano=="MEDIANO":
            subtotalrefresco=numero*40
        elif tamano =="GRANDE":
            subtotalrefresco=numero*60
        
        self.lbSubtotal=self.subtotalDulceria+subtotalrefresco
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel(f"${self.lbSubtotal}")
        self.infoDulceria=self.infoDulceria+ f"{numero} Refresco: {sabor} tamaño {tamano}\n"
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel(self.infoDulceria)
        event.Skip()
        
    def LimpiarD(self):

        self.subtotalDulceria=0
        self.infoDulceria=""

        self.spComboB.SetValue(0)
        self.spComboC.SetValue(0)
        self.spComboF.SetValue(0)
        self.spPalomitasCh.SetValue(0)
        self.soPalomitasMd.SetValue(0)
        self.spPalomitasG.SetValue(0)
        self.spCantidad.SetValue(0)
        self.cmbSabor.SetSelection(wx.NOT_FOUND)
        self.cmbTamano.SetSelection(wx.NOT_FOUND)
        self.lbProductosAgregados.SetLabel("---")
        self.lbSubtotal.SetLabel("$00.00")
        
    def limpiarDulceria(self):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        self.LimpiarD()
        event.Skip()
    def siguienteDulceria(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana3.<event_handler>
        pregunta=wx.MessageDialog(self,
        f"Confirmacion de dulceria.\n"
        f"¿Esta seguro que desea adquirir?\n\n{self.infoDulceria}\n"
        f"Subtotal Dulceria: ${self.subtotalDulceria}",
        "Dulceria",style=wx.YES_NO|wx.ICON_QUESTION)
        respuesta=pregunta.ShowModal()
        pregunta.Destroy()
        if respuesta==wx.ID_YES:
            v4=Ventana4(self, informacion=self.infoTaquilla,
                        subtotal1=self.subtotalTaquilla,
                        informacion2=self.infoDulceria,
                        subtotal2=self.subtotalDulceria)
            v4.Show()
            self.LimpiarD()
            self.Hide()
        elif respuesta==wx.ID_NO:
            self.LimpiarD()

        event.Skip()
# end of class Ventana3

class Ventana2(wx.Frame):
    def __init__(self, *args, **kwds):
        # begin wxGlade: Ventana2.__init__
        kwds["style"] = kwds.get("style", 0) | wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE
        wx.Frame.__init__(self, *args, **kwds)
        self.SetSize((625, 876))
        self.SetTitle("frame_1")
        self.SetBackgroundColour(wx.Colour(255, 0, 0))
        self.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(0, 0, 0))

        self.panel_1 = wx.Panel(self, wx.ID_ANY)
        self.panel_1.SetMinSize((700, 396))

        sizer_1 = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)

        grid_sizer_1 = wx.GridSizer(1, 3, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_1, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        bitmap_1 = wx.StaticBitmap(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, wx.Bitmap("./stock-vector-ticket-icon-vector-line-raffle-ticket-symbol-trendy-flat-outline-ui-sign-design-thin-linear-1050259787.jpg", wx.BITMAP_TYPE_ANY))
        grid_sizer_1.Add(bitmap_1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        label_1 = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Taquilla", style=wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL)
        label_1.SetMinSize((200, 30))
        label_1.SetFont(wx.Font(26, wx.FONTFAMILY_DECORATIVE, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Bauhaus 93"))
        grid_sizer_1.Add(label_1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL | wx.RESERVE_SPACE_EVEN_IF_HIDDEN, 0)

        bitmap_2 = wx.StaticBitmap(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, wx.Bitmap("./stock-vector-ticket-icon-vector-line-raffle-ticket-symbol-trendy-flat-outline-ui-sign-design-thin-linear-1050259787.jpg", wx.BITMAP_TYPE_ANY))
        grid_sizer_1.Add(bitmap_2, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        grid_sizer_2 = wx.GridSizer(1, 3, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_2, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        self.lbpeliculas = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Pelicula:")
        self.lbpeliculas.SetMinSize((120, 44))
        self.lbpeliculas.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_2.Add(self.lbpeliculas, 0, 0, 0)

        self.cmbPeliculas = wx.ComboBox(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, choices=["Spiderman", "Que paso ayer", "Robot Salvaje", ""], style=wx.CB_DROPDOWN)
        self.cmbPeliculas.SetMinSize((140, 29))
        grid_sizer_2.Add(self.cmbPeliculas, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        self.bitmap_3 = wx.StaticBitmap(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, wx.Bitmap("./Spiderman.jpg", wx.BITMAP_TYPE_ANY))
        grid_sizer_2.Add(self.bitmap_3, 0, 0, 0)

        self.lbSala = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Sala 1")
        self.lbSala.SetMinSize((120, 44))
        self.lbSala.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.lbSala, 0, 0, 0)

        grid_sizer_3 = wx.GridSizer(1, 4, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_3, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        self.Lbhorario = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Horario")
        self.Lbhorario.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.Lbhorario, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.rbHorario1 = wx.RadioButton(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "17:00")
        self.rbHorario1.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.rbHorario1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.rbHorario2 = wx.RadioButton(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "18:00")
        self.rbHorario2.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.rbHorario2, 0, 0, 0)

        self.rbHorario3 = wx.RadioButton(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "19:00")
        self.rbHorario3.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_3.Add(self.rbHorario3, 0, 0, 0)

        grid_sizer_4 = wx.GridSizer(1, 2, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_4, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        label_5 = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Adultos($80):\n")
        label_5.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_4.Add(label_5, 0, 0, 0)

        self.tfAdultos = wx.TextCtrl(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "", style=wx.TE_PROCESS_ENTER)
        self.tfAdultos.SetMinSize((140, 20))
        grid_sizer_4.Add(self.tfAdultos, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER | wx.ALL | wx.FIXED_MINSIZE, 0)

        grid_sizer_5 = wx.GridSizer(1, 2, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_5, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        label_6 = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Menores($70):")
        label_6.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        grid_sizer_5.Add(label_6, 0, 0, 0)

        self.tfMenores = wx.TextCtrl(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "", style=wx.TE_PROCESS_ENTER)
        self.tfMenores.SetMinSize((140, 20))
        grid_sizer_5.Add(self.tfMenores, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER | wx.ALL | wx.FIXED_MINSIZE, 0)

        self.lbsubtotal = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Subtotal:")
        self.lbsubtotal.SetMinSize((120, 44))
        self.lbsubtotal.SetFont(wx.Font(28, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.lbsubtotal, 0, 0, 0)

        grid_sizer_6 = wx.GridSizer(1, 2, 0, 0)
        sizer_1.Add(grid_sizer_6, 1, wx.EXPAND, 0)

        self.btnlimpiar = wx.Button(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Limpiar")
        self.btnlimpiar.SetMinSize((140, 20))
        grid_sizer_6.Add(self.btnlimpiar, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        self.btnsiguiente = wx.Button(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Siguiente")
        self.btnsiguiente.SetMinSize((140, 20))
        grid_sizer_6.Add(self.btnsiguiente, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER, 0)

        self.panel_1.SetSizer(sizer_1)

        self.Layout()

        self.cmbPeliculas.Bind(wx.EVT_COMBOBOX, self.seleccionPelicula)
        self.rbHorario1.Bind(wx.EVT_RADIOBUTTON, self.seleccionHorario1)
        self.rbHorario2.Bind(wx.EVT_RADIOBUTTON, self.seleccionHorario2)
        self.rbHorario3.Bind(wx.EVT_RADIOBUTTON, self.seleccionHorario3)
        self.tfAdultos.Bind(wx.EVT_TEXT_ENTER, self.sumarAdultos)
        self.tfMenores.Bind(wx.EVT_TEXT_ENTER, self.sumarMenores)
        self.btnlimpiar.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.limpiarTaquilla)
        self.btnsiguiente.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.siguienteVentana)
        # end wxGlade

    def cargar_imagen(self, nombre_imagen):
        imagen = wx.Image(nombre_imagen, wx.BITMAP_TYPE_ANY)
        imagen = imagen.Scale(200, 300, wx.IMAGE_QUALITY_HIGH)
        self.bitmap_3.SetBitmap(wx.Bitmap(imagen))
        self.panel_1.Refresh()

    def seleccionPelicula(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        pelicula=self.cmbPeliculas.GetValue()
        imagen=""
        sala=""
        horario1=horario2=horario3=""
        print(f"La peicula seleccionada fue:{pelicula}")
        
        if pelicula=="Spiderman":
            imagen="Spiderman.jpg"
            sala="Sala 1"
            horario1="17:00"
            horario2="18:00"
            horario3="19:00"
        elif pelicula=="Que paso ayer":
            imagen="quepasoayer.jpg"
            sala="Sala 2"
            horario1="21:00"
            horario2="14:00"
            horario3="16:00"
        elif pelicula=="Robot Salvaje":
            imagen="robotsalvaje.jpg"
            sala="Sala 3"
            horario1="17:30"
            horario2="19:30"
            horario3="20:00"
            
        self.cargar_imagen(imagen)
        self.lbSala.SetLabel(sala)
        self.rbHorario1.SetLabel(horario1)
        self.rbHorario2.SetLabel(horario2)
        self.rbHorario3.SetLabel(horario3)
        self.informacion=f"Pelicula: {pelicula} \n Sala: {sala}"
        print(f"Listo para disfrutar de \n {self.informacion}")
        event.Skip()

    def seleccionHorario1(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        self.horarioSeleccionado=self.rbHorario1.GetLabel()
        event.Skip()

    def seleccionHorario2(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        self.horarioSeleccionado=self.rbHorario2.GetLabel()
        event.Skip()

    def seleccionHorario3(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        self.horarioSeleccionado=self.rbHorario3.GetLabel()
        event.Skip()

    def sumarAdultos(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        try:
            self.adultos=int(self.tfAdultos.GetValue())
            subtotal_a = self.adultos*80
            self.subtotal=subtotal_a
            self.lbsubtotal.SetLabel(f"Subtotal: ${subtotal_a:.2f}")
        except ValueError:
            wx.MessageBox("Por favor, ingrese un número válido.", "Error", wx.OK | wx.ICON_ERROR)
        event.Skip()

    def sumarMenores(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        try:
            self.menores=int(self.tfMenores.GetValue())
            subtotal_b=self.menores*70
            self.subtotal=(self.adultos*80) + subtotal_b
            self.lbsubtotal.SetLabel(f"Subtotal: ${self.subtotal:.2f}")
        except ValueError:
            wx.MessageBox("Por favor, ingrese un número válido.", "Error", wx.OK | wx.ICON_ERROR)
        event.Skip()

    def limpiarValores_Campos(self):

        self.subtotal=0
        self.adultos=0
        self.menores=0
        self.informacion=""
        self.horarioSeleccionado=""

        self.cargar_imagen("logodecine.jpg")
        self.rbHorario1.SetLabel("00:00")
        self.rbHorario2.SetLabel("00:00")
        self.rbHorario3.SetLabel("00:00")
        self.rbHorario1.SetValue(False)
        self.rbHorario2.SetValue(False)
        self.rbHorario3.SetValue(False)
        self.cmbPeliculas.SetSelection(wx.NOT_FOUND)
        self.lbSala.SetLabel("----")
        self.tfAdultos.SetValue("0")
        self.tfMenores.SetValue("0")
        self.lbsubtotal.SetLabel("0")

    def limpiarTaquilla(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        self.limpiarValores_Campos()
        event.Skip()

    def siguienteVentana(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana2.<event_handler>
        self.informacion = f"{self.informacion} \n Horario: {self.horarioSeleccionado}"
        self.informacion = f"{self.informacion} \n Adultos: {self.adultos}\n \n Menores de 12 años: {self.menores}"
        self.informacion = f"{self.informacion} \n Subtotal:{self.subtotal}"

        pregunta = wx.MessageDialog(
        self,
        f"Confirmacion de Taquilla:\n"
        f"¿Esta seguro que desea adquirir?\n\n{self.informacion}",
        "Taquilla",
        style=wx.YES_NO | wx.ICON_QUESTION
        )

        respuesta = pregunta.ShowModal()
        pregunta.Destroy()

        if respuesta == wx.ID_YES:
            print(f"Venta de taquilla confirmada:\n {self.informacion}")
            v3 = Ventana3(self, informacion=self.informacion, subtotal=self.subtotal)
            v3.Show()
            self.limpiarValores_Campos()
            self.Hide()
        elif respuesta == wx.ID_NO:
            self.limpiarValores_Campos()
        event.Skip()

# end of class Ventana2

class Ventana1(wx.Frame):
    def __init__(self, *args, **kwds):
        # begin wxGlade: Ventana1.__init__
        kwds["style"] = kwds.get("style", 0) | wx.DEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE
        wx.Frame.__init__(self, *args, **kwds)
        self.SetSize((750, 696))
        self.SetTitle("inicio de sesion -Cine Plus")

        self.panel_1 = wx.Panel(self, wx.ID_ANY)
        self.panel_1.SetBackgroundColour(wx.Colour(165, 42, 42))
        self.panel_1.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(215, 212, 255))

        sizer_1 = wx.BoxSizer(wx.VERTICAL)

        Labvn = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Bienvenido a cine plus", style=wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL)
        Labvn.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(255, 255, 255))
        Labvn.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(Labvn, 0, wx.ALL | wx.EXPAND, 9)

        bitmap_1 = wx.StaticBitmap(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, wx.Bitmap("./logodecine.jpg", wx.BITMAP_TYPE_ANY))
        sizer_1.Add(bitmap_1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL | wx.ALL, 65)

        Usuario = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Usuario:")
        Usuario.SetMinSize((132, 35))
        Usuario.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(255, 255, 255))
        Usuario.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(Usuario, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.tfUsuario = wx.TextCtrl(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "")
        self.tfUsuario.SetMinSize((200, 27))
        self.tfUsuario.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.tfUsuario, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL | wx.ALL, 4)

        label_1 = wx.StaticText(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, u"Contrase�a:")
        label_1.SetMinSize((132, 32))
        label_1.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(label_1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.textContrasena = wx.TextCtrl(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "")
        self.textContrasena.SetMinSize((200, 27))
        self.textContrasena.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_ITALIC, wx.FONTWEIGHT_NORMAL, 0, "Arial"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.textContrasena, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.Entrar = wx.Button(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Entrar")
        self.Entrar.SetMinSize((128, 30))
        self.Entrar.SetBackgroundColour(wx.Colour(0, 127, 255))
        self.Entrar.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(0, 0, 0))
        self.Entrar.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_BOLD, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.Entrar, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL | wx.ALL, 4)

        self.button_1 = wx.Button(self.panel_1, wx.ID_ANY, "Salir")
        self.button_1.SetMinSize((128, 30))
        self.button_1.SetBackgroundColour(wx.Colour(255, 0, 0))
        self.button_1.SetForegroundColour(wx.Colour(0, 0, 0))
        self.button_1.SetFont(wx.Font(18, wx.FONTFAMILY_SWISS, wx.FONTSTYLE_NORMAL, wx.FONTWEIGHT_BOLD, 0, "Arial Narrow"))
        sizer_1.Add(self.button_1, 0, wx.ALIGN_CENTER_HORIZONTAL, 0)

        self.panel_1.SetSizer(sizer_1)

        self.Layout()

        self.Entrar.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.confirma_usuario_clave)
        self.button_1.Bind(wx.EVT_BUTTON, self.cerrar_programa)
        # end wxGlade

    def confirma_usuario_clave(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana1.<event_handler>
        nombre=self.tfUsuario.GetValue()
        clave=self.textContrasena.GetValue()
        
        if nombre=="Hectorin" and clave=="123":
            print(f"¡Bienvenido,{nombre}! Acceso autorizado.")
            v2=Ventana2(self)
            v2.Show()
            self.Hide()
        else:
            print("Acceso denegado. Usuario o clave incorrectos")
        event.Skip()

    def cerrar_programa(self, event):  # wxGlade: Ventana1.<event_handler>
        pregunta=wx.MessageDialog(self, "Se cerrra la ventana. \n" \
        "¿Esta seguro que desa salir?", "Confirmar salida", style=wx.YES_NO | wx.ICON_QUESTION)
        respuesta=pregunta.ShowModal()
        pregunta.Destroy()
        if respuesta==wx.ID_YES:
            print("Bye!")
            self.Close()
        event.Skip()

# end of class Ventana1

class MyAppCineplus(wx.App):
    def OnInit(self):
        self.frame = Ventana1(None, wx.ID_ANY, "")
        self.SetTopWindow(self.frame)
        self.frame.Show()
        return True

# end of class MyAppCineplus

if __name__ == "__main__":
    appCineplus = MyAppCineplus(0)
    appCineplus.MainLoop()
